happily adverb
(PLEASED)

B1 in a happy way: happily married He was happily married with two young children. She munched happily on her chocolate bar.happily ever after After nine years in Cambridge, Susannah and Guy moved to Watlington, where they lived happily ever after.
B2 willingly: I'd happily offer to help him if I thought it would make any difference.
